Je obljuba volivcem iz konservativnega političnega manifesta 2019.
Šlo je pa takole (hvala, BBC):
"This is known as the triple lock. The increase comes into effect
each April. It was introduced by the Conservative/Liberal Democrat
coalition government in 2010.In its 2019 election manifesto, the
Conservative Party said it would keep the triple lock in place for
the duration of this Parliament. However, during the Covid-19
pandemic the triple lock was suspended. This was because of an
unusually large rise in average earnings following the end of the
government's furlough scheme. The government had previously pledged
to restore the lock from April 2023."
